#include<iostream>
#include <stdio.h>
using namespace std;
 
 
int main()
{    
        int t;scanf("%d",&t);
 
        for(int i=0;i<t;i++)
        {       int nails;bool found=false;     
                scanf("%d",&nails);
                
                int num0,num1,num2,num3,num4;           
 
                scanf("%d %d %d",&num3,&num2,&num1);
 
                for(int j=9;j>0;j--)
                {       num4=j;
 
                        for(int k=9;k>-1;k--)
                        {
                                num0=k;
 
                                if((num0+num1*10+num2*100+num3*1000+num4*10000)%nails==0)
                                {printf("%d %d %d\n",num4,num0,(num0+num1*10+num2*100+num3*1000+num4*10000)/nails );
                                found=true;break;}                      
                        }
                        if(found)
                        {break;}
                }
                if(!found)
                {printf("0 \n");}
 
        }
        return 0;
}
